mapper.sql: id, parent_id AS parentId, parent_ids AS parentIds, `name`, sort, area_id AS areaId, code, `type`, grade, address, zip_code AS zipCode, master, phone, fax, email, USEABLE, PRIMARY_PERSON AS primaryPerson, DEPUTY_PERSON AS deputyPerson, create_by AS createBy, create_date AS createDate, update_by AS updateBy, update_date AS updateDate, remarks, del_flag AS delFlag
